content: **beached granny baby blanket crochet pattern** create a cozy and colorful keepsake with the beached granny baby blanket pattern this beginner-friendly crochet project is designed to be simple meditative and rewarding whether you re crafting a baby gift or adding a charming handmade accent to your home this pattern will guide you every step of the way **pattern details ** * skill level beginner * techniques used slip knot chain stitch double_crochet v_stitch * finished size approx 31 x 40 easily adjustable * materials worsted weight yarn approx 440g total & 7mm crochet hook * customization options personalize with your favorite color combinations or add creative stripes for a unique touch **why you ll love it ** * clear instructions with step-by-step guidance * relaxing stitch pattern perfect for crocheting on cozy evenings * adaptable design resize for baby blankets throws or larger projects * bonus tips for beginners included plus you ll discover creative stripe ideas and seamless color-change techniques to make this blanket truly your own the beached granny stitch can also be used for other projects like scarves shawls and cushions enjoy the joy of handmade and turn simple stitches into something magical ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/3dsz7kz ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/4atk0yl ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/n5yifwedwqu ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/hmowwhyaxkk
